name: Your World VR
description:
MAIN FEATURES

  • Avatar customization
  • Many items that can be placed anywhere
  • All items can be made any size
  • All items can be recolored
  • Items can be made climbable
  • All items can be left frozen or made to be affected by physics
  • Place traps, enemies, obstacles, and much more
  • Import your own models
  • Share and try community made maps using Steam Workshop

WHAT WILL YOU BUILD

Use your imagination to build Your World anyway you want. You build the landscape and everything in it. Build a giant obstacle course to try and conquer with traps, enemies, and even a boss that gains new abilities as its weakened, or anything else you could imagine. Use the npc builder to create custom made npc's from any items you choose to make a truly unique companion. All progress can be saved and shared through the Steam Workshop. Join the discord for tips , help, or to share or find community made worlds https://discord.gg/m8zsm7eyRZ
